name.th: Twiblocker - วิดีโอ adblocker

short.ar: يساعدك امتداد TwiBlocker Adblock على منع إعلانات الفيديو.
short.am: የ Twablocker ቅጥያ የቪዲዮ ማስታወቂያዎችን ለማገድ ይረዳዎታል.
short.bg: Разширението на Twiblocker Adblock ви помага да блокирате видеореклами.
short.bn: টুইব্লকার অ্যাডব্লক এক্সটেনশন আপনাকে ভিডিও বিজ্ঞাপনগুলি ব্লক করতে সহায়তা করে।

short.cs: Rozšíření Adblock Twiblocker vám pomůže blokovat videoreklamy.
short.da: Twiblocker AdBlock -udvidelsen hjælper dig med at blokere videoannoncer.

short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fi: The TwiBlocker Adblock extension helps you block video ads.
short.es,es_419: La extensión AdBlock de Twibblocker le ayuda a bloquear los anuncios de video.
short.et: Twiblockeri adbloki laiendus aitab teil videoreklaame blokeerida.
short.fa: برنامه افزودنی AdBlock Twiblocker به شما در مسدود کردن تبلیغات ویدیویی کمک می کند.
short.fil: Ang twiblocker adblock extension ay tumutulong sa iyo na i -block ang mga ad ng video.
short.fr: L'extension AdBlock TwiBlocker vous aide à bloquer les publicités vidéo.
short.gu: ટ્વિબ્લોકર એડબ્લોક એક્સ્ટેંશન તમને વિડિઓ જાહેરાતો અવરોધિત કરવામાં સહાય કરે છે.
short.he: סיומת ה- TwiBlocker Adblock עוזרת לך לחסום מודעות וידאו.
short.hi: Twiblocker Adblock एक्सटेंशन आपको वीडियो विज्ञापनों को ब्लॉक करने में मदद करता है।
short.hr: Twiblocker dodatak adblocka pomaže vam u blokiranju video oglasa.
short.hu: A Twiblocker Adblock kiterjesztés segít blokkolni a videohirdetéseket.
short.id: Ekstensi Twiblocker Adblock membantu Anda memblokir iklan video.
short.it: L'estensione Adblock di Twiblocker ti aiuta a bloccare gli annunci video.
short.ja: Twiblocker Adblock拡張機能は、ビデオ広告をブロックするのに役立ちます。
short.kn: ಟ್ವಿಬ್ಲಾಕರ್ ಆಡ್ಬ್ಲಾಕ್ ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆಯು ವೀಡಿಯೊ ಜಾಹೀರಾತುಗಳನ್ನು ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಿಸಲು ನಿಮಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ.
short.ko: Twiblocker Adblock Extension은 비디오 광고를 차단하는 데 도움이됩니다.
short.lt: „Twiblocker Adblock“ plėtinys padeda užblokuoti vaizdo įrašų skelbimus.
short.lv: Twiblocker adblock paplašinājums palīdz bloķēt video reklāmas.
short.ml: വീഡിയോ പരസ്യങ്ങൾ തടയാൻ twiblocker adblock വിപുലീകരണം നിങ്ങളെ സഹായിക്കുന്നു.
short.mr: ट्वीब्लॉकर अ‍ॅडब्लॉक विस्तार आपल्याला व्हिडिओ जाहिराती अवरोधित करण्यात मदत करते.
short.ms: Twiblocker Adblock Extension membantu anda menyekat iklan video.
short.nl: De Twiblocker Adblock -extensie helpt u om videoadvertenties te blokkeren.
short.no: TwiBlocker Adblock Extension hjelper deg med å blokkere videoannonser.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie AdBlock Twiblocker pomaga blokować reklamy wideo.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão do Adblock Twiblocker ajuda a bloquear os anúncios de vídeo.
short.ro: Extensia TwiBlocker Adblock vă ajută să blocați anunțurile video.
short.ru: Расширение Adblock Twiblocker помогает заблокировать видео объявления.
short.sk: Rozšírenie TwiBlocker Adblock vám pomôže blokovať videonahrávky.
short.sl: Twiblocker adblock razširitev vam pomaga blokirati video oglase.
short.sr: Твиблоцкер Адблоцк Ектенсион вам помаже да блокирате видео огласе.
short.sv: Twiblocker Adblock -förlängningen hjälper dig att blockera videoannonser.
short.sw: Ugani wa Adblock wa Twiblocker hukusaidia kuzuia matangazo ya video.
short.ta: வீடியோ விளம்பரங்களைத் தடுக்க ட்விப் பிளாக்கர் ADBLOCK நீட்டிப்பு உங்களுக்கு உதவுகிறது.
short.te: ట్వీబ్లాకర్ యాడ్‌బ్లాక్ పొడిగింపు వీడియో ప్రకటనలను నిరోధించడంలో మీకు సహాయపడుతుంది.
short.th: ส่วนขยายของ Twiblocker Adblock ช่วยให้คุณบล็อกโฆษณาวิดีโอ
short.tr: Twiblocker adblock uzantısı, video reklamlarını engellemenize yardımcı olur.
short.uk: Розширення Adblock Twiblocker допомагає блокувати відеорекламу.
short.vi: Tiện ích mở rộng adblock twiblocker giúp bạn chặn quảng cáo video.
short.zh_CN: Twiblocker Adblock扩展程序可帮助您阻止视频广告。
short.zh_TW: Twiblocker Adblock擴展程序可幫助您阻止視頻廣告。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
TwiBlocker AdBlocker extension is a video ad-blocker. The extension doesn’t use any external proxy, VPN, or 3rd party scripts. 

Features:
>> Easy Toggle ON/OFF
      Turn on blocking with one click on the toggle button.
>> High-Quality Streaming
     It blocks ads without compromising streaming quality. You can disable the ad      
     blocking prompt to improve the watching experience.
>> Show Blocking Message
     Displays the message after blocking ads. Also, you can hide the message.
>> Free
100% free and safe.

Version 1.1.8 changes
>> New dark UI
>> Bug fixes

Version 1.1.4 changes
>> "Commercial break in progress" bug fixed
>> Improved UI

Note: This extension does not collect/share any of your personal information and it is developed after taking inspiration from open-source code.

The extension requires such permissions as:

 - "Access data for all websites": to block ads coming from multiple sites.
 - "Access to browser tabs" to get details about the website you visit (website url, tab id, parent tab id). It helps us to block ad requests.
 - “Notifications”: to send the important adblocking notifications.
long.en,en_AU,fi:
TwiBlocker AdBlocker extension is a video ad-blocker. The extension doesn’t use any external proxy, VPN, or 3rd party scripts. 

Features:
>> Easy Toggle ON/OFF
      Turn on blocking with one click on the toggle button.
>> High-Quality Streaming
     It blocks ads without compromising streaming quality. You can disable the ad      
     blocking prompt to improve the watching experience.
>> Show Blocking Message
     Displays the message after blocking ads.

Version 1.1.18 changes
>> Minor bug fixed
>> New UI

Version 1.1.9 changes
>> "Commercial break in progress/purple screen" bug fixed

Version 1.1.8 changes
>> New dark UI
>> Bug fixes

Version 1.1.4 changes
>> "Commercial break in progress" bug fixed
>> Improved UI

Note: This extension does not collect/share any of your personal information and it is developed after taking inspiration from open-source code.

The extension requires such permissions as:

 - "Access data for all websites": to block ads coming from multiple sites.
 - "Access to browser tabs" to get details about the website you visit (website url, tab id, parent tab id). It helps us to block ad requests.
 - “Notifications”: to send the important adblocking notifications.
long.ml:
Twitch AdBlocker extension is a video ad-blocker for Twitch. The extension doesn’t use any external proxy, VPN, or 3rd party scripts. 

Features:
>> Easy Toggle ON/OFF
      Turn on blocking with one click on the toggle button.
>> High-Quality Streaming
     It blocks ads without compromising Twitch streaming. You can disable the ad      
     blocking prompt to improve the watching experience.
>> Show Blocking Message
     Displays the message after blocking ads. Also, you can hide the message.
>> Free
100% free and safe.

Version 1.1.4 changes
>> Twitch "commercial break in progress" bug fixed
>> Improved UI

Note: This extension does not collect/share any of your personal information and it is developed after taking inspiration from open-source code.
